title: Shishunki-chan no Shitsukekata
original_name: 思春期ちゃんのしつけかた
sinopse:
Shiratori Kousuke, an athletic and good-natured 15 year old boy with an appropriately healthy interest in girls, and Iijima Kanon, a girl who is bad at talking to boys due to immersing herself too much in books but wants to try falling in love.

(Source: MU)
